content: IF you just need to SHOW others the data, NOT manipulate you might try setting the Table up in EXCEL or another Spreadsheet and fix the margins as you wish them to be. Do a Grab of just what you want and then past into your Thunderbird eMail that you are sending out. IT SHOULD WORK, BUT I'M NOT 100% SURE.
creator: JayGee59

content: Do you see the same thing if you restart your computer in safe mode with networking? I would hazard a guess that the issue is not Thunderbird but other third party software the pokes it's head up when Thunderbird is running. (Think antivirus because it functions slowly or VPN that may restrict bandwidth on email connections because the operator sees folk routinely download gigbytes of data from mail accounts, change a setting and repeat, even google will restrict your bandwidth if you use to much in a day.)
creator: MattAuSupport
